first_para: George Michael Edward Hollingbery BA MBA (born 12 October 1963) is a British Conservative Party politician who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Meon Valley, a new Hampshire constituency created as a result of changes made by the Boundary Commission for England.

full.extract:
George Michael Edward Hollingbery BA MBA (born 12 October 1963) is a British Conservative Party politician who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Meon Valley, a new Hampshire constituency created as a result of changes made by the Boundary Commission for England.
^ "George Hollingbery MP". BBC Democracy Live. BBC. Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ http://www.london-gazette.co.uk/issues/59418/notices/1118281/from=2010-05-06;to=2010-05-19;all=returned+westminster/
^ "George Hollingbery". Conservative Party website. Retrieved 21 November 2013. 
^ "Election 2010: Meon Valley". Southern Daily Echo. Retrieved 7 May 2010.
full.title: George Hollingbery
